english.segment1: Call me Pennywise and see. What it means to me. The things that set you free. Don't mean as much to me
english.segment2: Call me anything you please. Things you may believe. For all your perfect plans. I'm not a lesser man
english.segment3: So call it as you see. But you didn't rescue me. I turn around
english.segment4: Can we stretch humility. Live our lives to mean something. Did we ever stop to think. We're squandering the lead
english.segment5: So call it as you see. But you didn't rescue me. I turn around
english.segment6: Leave me stray beyond me. Please be easy on me. Aren't we caught in the same lane. Please be
english.segment7: Could you sacrifice ideals. offer me release. To exercise a dream. Invisible it seems
english.segment8: Call me Pennywise and see. What it means to be. The things that set you free
